SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gardenDtl

SELECT *, case when managelevelCode="089001" then "초보자" when managelevelCode="089002" then "경험자" when managelevelCode="089003" then "전문가" else "정보없음" end as manageleveltext,
CASE WHEN grwtveCodeNm IS NULL OR grwtveCodeNm = '' THEN '정보없음' ELSE grwtveCodeNm END AS growthrate,
CASE WHEN hdCodeNm IS NULL OR hdCodeNm = '' THEN '정보없음' ELSE hdCodeNm END AS humidity,
CASE WHEN grwhTpCodeNm IS NULL OR grwhTpCodeNm = '' THEN '정보없음' ELSE grwhTpCodeNm END AS growthTemperature,
CASE WHEN orgplceInfo IS NULL OR orgplceInfo = "" THEN "정보없음" ELSE orgplceInfo END AS orgplce,
CASE WHEN lefStleInfo IS NULL OR lefStleInfo = "" THEN "정보없음" ELSE lefStleInfo END AS leafShape,
CASE WHEN smellCodeNm IS NULL OR smellCodeNm = "" THEN "정보없음" ELSE smellCodeNm END AS smellCodeName,
CASE WHEN toxctyInfo IS NULL OR toxctyInfo = "" THEN "정보없음" ELSE toxctyInfo END AS toxin,
CASE WHEN prpgtEraInfo IS NULL OR prpgtEraInfo = "" THEN "정보없음" ELSE prpgtEraInfo END AS prpgtEra,
CASE WHEN etcEraInfo IS NULL OR etcEraInfo = "" THEN "정보없음" ELSE etcEraInfo END AS etcEra,
CASE WHEN frtlzrInfo IS NULL OR frtlzrInfo = "" THEN "정보없음" ELSE frtlzrInfo END AS frtlzr,
CASE WHEN dlthtsManageInfo IS NULL OR dlthtsManageInfo = "" THEN "정보없음" ELSE dlthtsManageInfo END AS dlthtsManage,
CASE WHEN watercycleSprngCodeNm IS NULL OR watercycleSprngCodeNm = "" THEN "정보없음" ELSE watercycleSprngCodeNm END AS watercycleSprng, CASE WHEN watercycleSummerCodeNm IS NULL OR watercycleSummerCodeNm = "" THEN "정보없음" ELSE watercycleSummerCodeNm END AS watercycleSummer, CASE WHEN watercycleAutumnCodeNm IS NULL OR watercycleAutumnCodeNm = "" THEN "정보없음" ELSE watercycleAutumnCodeNm END AS watercycleAutumn, CASE WHEN watercycleWinterCodeNm IS NULL OR watercycleWinterCodeNm = "" THEN "정보없음" ELSE watercycleWinterCodeNm END AS watercycleWinter,
SUBSTRING_INDEX(rtnStreFileNm, '|', 1) AS imageA, SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(rtnStreFileNm, '|', -2), '|', 1) AS imageB, SUBSTRING_INDEX(rtnStreFileNm, '|', -1) AS imageC
FROM gardenDtl WHERE cntntsNo = #{id}
